inputs.label: Default Value
inputs.tooltip: Enter default value of component. (formData, formMode, globalState) are exposed

inputs.label: Validator
inputs.tooltip: Enter custom validator logic for form.item rules. Returns a Promise

components.label: On Change
components.tooltip: Enter custom eventhandler on changing of event. (form, event) are exposed

components.label: On Focus
components.tooltip: Enter custom eventhandler on focus of event. (form, event) are exposed

components.label: On Blur
components.tooltip: Enter custom eventhandler on blur of event. (form, event) are exposed

inputs.label: Weight
inputs.tooltip: Controls text thickness (light, normal, bold, etc.)

components.label: Custom CSS
components.tooltip: A script that returns the style of the element as an object. This should conform to CSSProperties
